attributes.action: reduce holiday prices during school holidays
attributes.additional_details: If holiday companies are self governing regarding pricing, would it take an all out refusal to book, before they get their heads out of the sand and think about customers instead of profits?
attributes.background: Holiday prices are vastly inflated during school holidays and also the allocation of free child places are, in the majority, during term time meaning that there is even more incentive to take kids out of school for cheaper holidays
